summary.Title: Waiters, summer 2022, Stavern, Norway
summary.Presentation:
The Grill Pit, Stavern, Norge, is looking for waiters, summer 2022.
Skills

Language: Norwegian, Swedish, Danish or English
Service- and result orientat

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The Grill Pit, Stavern, Norge, is looking for waiters, summer 2022.

Skills

  • Language: Norwegian, Swedish, Danish or English
  • Service- and result orientated
  • Motivated by giving the customers the best experience
  • Desire to develop your competences in our exciting concept
  • Manage stress and HIGH working tempo
  • 20 years of age or more (Norwegian alcohol laws)
  • Driving licence B (advantage, but no demand)

Startdato upon agreement.

Working hours 8 to 12 hours pr shift.

Work place in Stavern, Dampskipsbrygga restaurant or Kaikanten Street Food.

Salary NOK 175-195/hour, depending on education, skills and experience

We have accommodation in shared house available for a reasonable price.

More information 

Preben Gulliksen, phone number +47 9202 9353

How to apply?

Send email to soknad@thegrillpit.no and we might have a skype-meeting.

Latest application date is 15.05.2022.

(from NAV EURES Norway)

 

The Grill Pit

We are running a unique consept in Catering, Restaurant and Foodtruck. We have two restaurants in Stavern. One with different grill dishes like meat and fish and one based on Street Food like fresh made tacos, burgers, loaded fries.

This job is both hectic and rewarding, and allows you to get to know many new people. We have customers in different segments such as events, weddings, festivals, catering and restaurants. Therefore the work tasks is very much varied!

www.thegrillpit.no

Stavern

is a lovely, busy village summertime surroundet by beaches, summer-houses and sites for caravan. Only 140 km. to Oslo and close to international airport and ferries to Strömstad/Sweden and Hirtshals/Denmark. 

https://www.larvik.kommune.no/
